issue.title: [CF 654] Predatory Swiftness export
issue.body:
Can you give me an export for Predatory Swiftness please. Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Russianboy | Imported from CurseForge issue #654 | Raw

comments.body:
You didn't tell me exactly what you want the icon to do, so no, I can't create an export string for you. You have also not given my any indication that you have at least tried to do this yourself, so I don't know what part of setting this up you are having trouble with.

You either need to be more specific about what you want to track about Predatory Swiftness, post an export string of the icon that you have tried to make work but can't and I will see what is wrong, or ask specific questions about how to achieve a specific setup TellMeWhen.

Edited Oct 11, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I would like Tell Me When to activate a Healing Touch icon when Predatory Swiftness (feral druid passive ability) procs.


> Posted by CurseForge user mlmate2

This ticket is nearly two months old, and it also was not opened by you, mlmate2. Please open a new ticket if you need help.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Alguien puede ayudarme ha hacer un icono en TellMeWhen que se visualice cuando se activa ""Destreza del Depredador"(16074) y deja de visualizarse cuando no está activa esa magia. Gracias de antemano, estoy iniciándome en el uso de este addon que parece fantástico pero como soy muy topo me cuesta bastante. Gracias


> Posted by CurseForge user senti2

Hi Cybeloras, is there an answer to this anywhere? Not sure what is not specific, but I have a similar need as mlmate, I will try to be as much as specific as possible...

What I would like to set is: if the Pred. Swift. procs = pops up on the icon bar alerting me I can use the instant healing touch spell + some sound notification. Please tell me what you need to know, if Im not specific enough. Im a fresh user never used this addon before. I tried to set it up myself, but somehow, I obviously fail to do that by just intuition. My way was to set condition - I did set these 4 values (spell charges / Predatory Swiftness / == / 0) In notification I did set - On show - sound Humm

Is that possible to set this up ? How? A guide would be better then export for the lerning curve.

Thanks

Edited Dec 3, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Kmotra

This ticket has now been closed for two YEARS. My previous reply still applies - open a new ticket.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
